intro: Zieria hindii, commonly known as the pink zieria, is a shrub native to the southeastern regions of Australia. Zieria hindii thrives in moist, shaded environments, often found in heathlands and forest understories. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for rock gardens and shady borders in horticulture.
